QuestData.Title: They Won't Know What Hit Them
QuestData.Description:
Luring the Fearstalker here will prove pointless unless we can tilt the odds. She will surely show up with a small army.
Plant these anima containers. When the time comes, we will release their contents into the air, dousing her and her forces in a thick layer of anima.
That should get the devourers infesting this place to flock to them like moths to a flame.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the Accuser at the Fearstalker's Manor.
QuestData.RewardText: The devourers will rip them to shreds.
